title: Spacious Beacon Street 2Bed/2Bath, C+D Trains, Longwood Med-9/1!
posting_body: Parking:: off-street parking is available for rent
Spacious and very bright two bedroom WITH TWO FULL BATHS on the second floor of a beautiful Beacon Street brownstone, available September 1st!
This unit features hardwood floors, high ceilings, tons of windows, a nicely updated eat-in kitchen, two very good size bedrooms and plenty of charm and character!
This building has on-site management, laundry facilities, and parking is available for rent.
This unbelievable location is steps away from the C+D trains, The Longwood Medical Center and just a short distance to Downtown Boston.
Cats are allowed and for further information and showings, call Heidi at 617-699-4568!
